flawed_nl_solution:
The town used to emit 800 pounds of carbon a year because 80 x 10 = <<80*10=800>>800
20 now take the bus because 80 x 0.25 = <<80*0.25=20>>20
62 people still drive because 80 - 20 = <<80-20=62>>62
Those 62 people create 620 pounds of carbon because 62 x 10 = <<62*10=620>>620
The town now emits 720 pounds of carbon because 100 + 620 = <<100+620=720>>720
The town emits 80 fewer pounds of carbon now because 800 - 720 = <<800-720=80>>80
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 62. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
